author: kfogel
msg: Organize server information a bit more consistently:
* HACKING (Debugging the server): New section, contains material
* INSTALL: Just reference above new section.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * INSTALL (ADDENDUM): Clarify kfogel's remarks by explaining relevant

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * INSTALL (HTTPD setup): Remove note about --with-mpm=prefork as
httpd-2.0 can determine this on its own and removing this makes it
less confusing for the reader (using worker MPM is left as an exercise
for the curious).  Also, APR will currently disable threads on FreeBSD,
so no note is needed here about that.  Also, I believe the comment
about libmm.so refers to Ralf Engleschall's MM library that APR used
to use for shared memory - this library is no longer used by APR.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Fix goof in DB version, and fix install of libsvn_ra.so and libsvn_ra_local.so.
